text:
I have used the junit-Task in multiple subant tasks.
If in one junit-Task a Exception is thrown,
all following junit-Task loses their output.

I have fixed it by setting the fork parameter to true.
OK, this is a workaround. But in Restricted-Mode 
(with Permissions) forking is not allowed.
creator: sebastian.sickelmann@informatik.fh-ge.de
